1.0.name: wordpress/sh-slideshow
1.0.description: SH Slideshow is a Wordpress plugin that will create an animated promo slideshow on your site. You can use it to promote any pages, posts, custom post types in your site and pages from outside. It is fully customisable through the admin pages of your blog. Unlike some other slideshow components, SH Slideshow makes use of jQuery JavaScript frameworks and jQuery plugins.
